### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-82.5) to store coal
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-81.5) 
-  Chest (position x=40.5, y=-80.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5) to store iron ore

### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with lab_input={'automation-science-pack': 67}

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when chest is full
-  Empty the chest at the specified position to continue mining or other activities.
### Errors when fuel source is full
-  Ensure that the fuel source is not full before continuing with mining or other activities.
### Errors when no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure that there are ingredients to smelt before starting the furnace.
### Errors when no input liquid
-  Ensure that there is an input liquid before starting the steam engine.
### Errors when out of fuel
-  Ensure that the boiler has fuel before starting it.
### Errors when chest at drop position is full
-  Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining.
### Errors when no fluid present in connections
-  Ensure that there is a fluid present in the connections before starting the steam engine.
### Errors when not connected
-  Ensure that the steam engine is connected to the necessary entities before starting it.
